title: Latest Patch Help (6.19)
body: My client is having a problem connecting to matches. Champ select goes fine, after that nothing. The game seems to "crash" and I can't seem to play the game. After re-logging I get the option to reconnect, which leads to nothing. Is this a problem with the latest patch? Is anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
Crashes can be caused by a number of different factors. The most common is that your client is not able to reach the game server, and a local network setting could be causing an unstable connection. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
